alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 09 at 5:02PM PDT until September 09 at 6:30PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR RIVERSIDE AND NORTHEASTERN SAN DIEGO COUNTIES... At 502 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches are possible in the warned area. Large mud flows and boulders have been reported on Highway 74 near Taylor. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Indio, southeastern Palm Springs, Coachella, Borrego Springs, Hwy 78 Between Borrego Springs Rd And Ocotillo Wells, Hwy 78 Between S2 And Borrego Springs Rd, eastern Anza, Palm Desert, Rancho Mirage and Thermal. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
